project.name: Eve Frontend Buffer Pool Implementation
project.shortDescription: Direct buffer pool POJO implementation used by Eve's frontend
project.description: A pool of direct memory buffer pools of fixed size. These resouces are expensive to create and destroy unlike regular memory allocated on the Java heap direct memory buffers are allocated outside of the Java managed memory space. The garbage collector does not apply to direct allocated buffers. As a consequence it is very costly to allocate and free direct buffers. These resources are ideal candidates for pooling. This is the purpose for this service.
